subject: Re: New quote: Axiom Resource Page

full_threads.body: @heath Just gonna close this one.

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
@joel

Let me know if you can’t access the spread sheet?

I will redo the image they reference now.

Thanks Heath,

We went through to QA and test this today and have just a couple of pieces of feedback which we have entered in this QA doc (second tab row 25 Resource page listing) Let me know if any q's.

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1GGu27hJvCBXgnKqB9soChoYVgISCpHjedzJSZOK7pGc/edit#gid=1263458556 <https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1GGu27hJvCBXgnKqB9soChoYVgISCpHjedzJSZOK7pGc/edit#gid=1263458556>

Thanks
Becci
Becci Drummond
HR & Business Operations Manager
0410 760087

Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday

Brand chemistry

On Tue, Sep 17, 2019 at 12:56 PM Heath Maguire <heath@wpperk.com <mailto:heath@wpperk.com>> wrote:
Hi Becci,

Ok sure thanks for getting back to me. It was setup by the previous developers and is currently in use on the site for the blogs.

We have by-passed it now (see the blog link below), we just didn’t want to rock the boat incase they were keen to use it.

Here is the blog page: https://axiomworkplaces.com.au/our-insights-blog/ <https://axiomworkplaces.com.au/our-insights-blog/>
And the resources page: https://axiomworkplaces.com.au/our-insights-resources/ <https://axiomworkplaces.com.au/our-insights-resources/>

We haven’t added a filter to the resources page as it’s overkill at the moment given the amount of items, but rest assured when the time comes, we can do so at no extra charge.

Let me know what you think? Thanks and speak soon,

Heath Maguire
Director

E. heath@wpperk.com <mailto:heath@wpperk.com> | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271


<https://wpperk.com/>

>

>
> Can we move forward without having access to this? What are the implications?
>
> Thanks
> Bec

>
> Axiom has been setup to aggregate their posts through the Algolia.com <http://algolia.com/> platform. We ideally need access to this to setup the Resources section as well.
>

>
> Thanks and speak soon,
